title: 1 man arrested in Sacramento mass shooting that killed 6 - The Associated Press
content:
1. 1 man arrested in Sacramento mass shooting that killed 6  The Associated Press
  2. Sacramento Mass Shooting: Latest on the investigation | Sunday 6:30 p.m. update  ABC10
  3. Biden uses Sacramento shooting to push gun control agenda: 'We must do more than mourn; we must act'  Fox News
  4. CA must act on gun laws after Sacramento mass shooting  Sacramento Bee
  5. Devastating Toll: Sacramento families overcome with grief for lost loved ones  KPIX CBS SF Bay Area
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) — Sacramento police announced an arrest Monday connected with the shooting that killed six people and wounded a dozen others in the heart of California’s capital city as at least two shooters fired more than 100 rounds and people ran for their lives.
